IGM_expectedValuesGUI: 【伤害标识进度】界面 现在 %s.
UI_setting_alphaMoE_text: 【伤害标识进度】面板的透明度
UI_setting_alphaMoE_tooltip:
显示【伤害标识进度】面板的不透明度（同样适用于背景）。有效数值为 0（完全透明）到 1（完全不透明）。
注意：当[不透明度]设置为 0 插件依旧为使用状态，即使它们不可见的

默认值：1.0
UI_setting_anchorpointEVV_tooltip:
Sets the starting point to which the display is aligned.

Options:
Top left: Sets top-left as alignment point.
Top center: Sets top-center as alignment point.
Top right: Sets the anchor point to the upper right corner (battle timer)
Bottom left: Sets the anchor point to the lower left corner (damage panel)
Bottom right: Sets the anchor point to the lower right corner (minimap)

Note:
If you're changing the screen resolution or changing from window mode to fullscreen the alignment defines the anchor point of the display.

At the starting point, the value of both coordinates (X & Y) is 0. Increasing X value shifts the text to the right, decreasing to the left. Increasing Y-value moves the text down, decreasing it moves it up.

default: Top left
UI_setting_anchorpointMoEGarage_tooltip:
Sets the starting point to which the display is aligned.

Options:
Top left: Sets top-left as alignment point.
Top center: Sets top-center as alignment point.
Top right: Sets the anchor point to the upper right corner (battle timer)
Bottom left: Sets the anchor point to the lower left corner (damage panel)
Bottom right: Sets the anchor point to the lower right corner (minimap)

Note:
If you're changing the screen resolution or changing from window mode to fullscreen the alignment defines the anchor point of the display.

At the starting point, the value of both coordinates (X & Y) is 0. Increasing X value shifts the text to the right, decreasing to the left. Increasing Y-value moves the text down, decreasing it moves it up.

default: Top center
UI_setting_anchorpointMoE_tooltip:
Sets the starting point to which the display is aligned.

Options:
Top left: Sets top-left as alignment point.
Top center: Sets top-center as alignment point.
Top right: Sets the anchor point to the upper right corner (battle timer)
Bottom left: Sets the anchor point to the lower left corner (damage panel)
Bottom right: Sets the anchor point to the lower right corner (minimap)

Note:
If you're changing the screen resolution or changing from window mode to fullscreen the alignment defines the anchor point of the display.

At the starting point, the value of both coordinates (X & Y) is 0. Increasing X value shifts the text to the right, decreasing to the left. Increasing Y-value moves the text down, decreasing it moves it up.

default: Bottom left
UI_setting_battleResultMode_tooltip: If activated, the WN8, EFF and/or the MoE Value in % will be shown in the battle result dialog. Options: Deactivated: WN8 & EFF: Shows the WN8 actually achieved in this battle. Info: This may differ from the value displayed in battle. Since hits from blind shots are also taken into account in the result screen. MoE: Displays the current MoE value in %. This can deviate from the value displayed in the game. Alles default: MoE
UI_setting_checkUpdate_tooltip:
如果激活，mod 会定期检查作者开发服务器上的 mod 更新。

默认值：选中
UI_setting_colorMoEBackground_text: 颜色:【伤害标识进度】背景
UI_setting_colorUnknown_text: 颜色:【伤害标识进度】未知
UI_setting_colorUp_text: 颜色:【伤害标识进度】提高
UI_setting_enableEVVDisplay_tooltip: 启用/禁用显示，实时计算战斗期间的【战斗效率】（EVV）。
UI_setting_enableMoEBackground_text: 显示【伤害标识进度】背景
UI_setting_enableMoEBackground_tooltip:
开启/关闭【伤害标识进度】的背景
如果启用，将使用定义的颜色。
UI_setting_enableMoEDisplay_text: 启用【伤害标识进度】显示
UI_setting_enableMoEDisplay_tooltip:
开启/关闭 在战斗中实时计算【伤害标识进度】的百分比。

感谢: 伤害标识进度 部分基于spoter[RU]的marksofexcellence mod
所以功劳要归于他！
UI_setting_enableMoEExtendedDisplay_tool: 启用该选项后，当按下【ALT】键时【伤害标识进度】面板将显示额外的扩展面板
UI_setting_fontSizeGarageMoE_tooltip: Only active when a layer is selected in "Show MoE info in garage"
UI_setting_fontSizeMoE_text: 【伤害标识进度】面板的字体大小
UI_setting_fontSize_text: 字体大小：【战斗效率】面板
UI_setting_hotkeyNextLayout_text: 快捷键：切换下一个【伤害标识进度】显示样式
UI_setting_hotkeyNextLayout_tooltip: 切换预设的【伤害标识进度】显示样式
UI_setting_hotkeyToggle_text: 快捷键: 切换面板锁定
UI_setting_hotkeyToggle_tooltip: 锁定/解锁面板（【伤害标识进度】显示窗口和预期值显示窗口）。你可以移动它们！
UI_setting_messageFormat_tooltip:
在这里，您可以自定义文本输出。
占位符包括：
{c_wn8} 当前 WN8 颜色
{wn8} 当前 Wn8
{curdmg} 电流损坏
{expdmg} 预期伤害
{tank} 阻挡伤害
{spot} 侦查伤害
{gunmarkdmg} 综合伤害
{iconspot} 侦查协助图标
{iconstun} 弹震协助图标
{icontrack} 断腿协助图标
{icondmg} 造成伤害图标
{iconmoe} 伤害标识图标
UI_setting_messageGarageMoE_text: 在车库中显示[伤害标识进度]消息
UI_setting_moeLayout_tooltip: 来自一些知名玩家的预设【伤害标识进度】样式。
UI_setting_showInGarage_text: 在车库中显示【伤害标识进度】
UI_setting_showInStatistic_text: 在统计工具提示中显示【伤害标识进度】信息
UI_setting_showInTechTreeMastery_text: 在技术树中显示【战斗嘉奖】
UI_setting_showInTechTree_text: 在技术树中显示【伤害标识进度】
UI_setting_version_text: 版本 {version} ({compiledate}) - 为 Wot 客户端编译：v{wotversion}
UI_setting_version_tooltip: 注释: "懒懒为 Wot 客户端编译" 显示 mod 编译时的版本号。这并不意味着它不能在新的 Wot 版本使用工作 - 但它没有被测试过！您始终可以从以下网址获取最新版本： https://wot.champi.de
UI_tooltips:
<font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">{currentMovingAvgDamage} 当前平均伤害</font>
<font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">{currentDamage} 需要平均伤害</font>
到达 <font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">{nextPercent}% </font>  需要 <font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">{needDamage}</font> 平均伤害
这个统计数字可用于在这辆车上最后的战斗
到达 <font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">20% </font>  需要 <font color="#F8F400" size="12">~{_20}</font> 平均伤害
到达 <font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">40% </font>  需要 <font color="#F8F400" size="12">~{_40}</font> 平均伤害
到达 <font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">55% </font>   需要 <font color="#F8F400" size="12">~{_55}</font> 平均伤害
到达 <font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">65% </font>   需要 <font color="#60FF00" size="12">~{_65}</font> 平均伤害
到达 <font color="#FFFFFF" size="12">85% </font>   需要 <font color="#02C9B3" size="12">~{_85}</font> 平均伤害
